entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the evening and ending before morning then 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 7:50 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
